author: Teresa Roca
title: Kail’s Nightmare! Inside Javi Marroquin’s Shocking Plan To Get Revenge On Ex Lowry
text:
Yes, please sign me up to receive The Daily Juice Privacy Policy send Kail’s Nightmare! Inside Javi Marroquin’s Shocking Plan To Get Revenge On Ex Lowry The 'Teen Mom' dad is moving on while she's pregnant and alone! Posted on Mar 13, 2017 @ 17:41PM 
Javi Marroquin is taking advantage of every opportunity when it comes to finding his soul mate! After the Teen Mom 2 star revealed his plans to join MTV’s Are You The One?, he exclusively admitted to Radar if he is joining Million Dollar Matchmaker too! 
The show’s matchmaker David Cruz tweeted at Marroquin, “ If you’re ready for love and some good advice @Pattistanger and I can help!” Marroquin responded, “I’m ready!” 
Cruz then advised Kailyn Lowry ‘s ex-husband to head to the website to sign up. 
When asked by Radar if he’s joining the show, Marroquin replied, “Hell yeah I would be open to it! I would have to figure out the logistics, but yeah .” 
The news comes after Marroquin sent an audition tape to MTV’s Are You The One?, where 10 single men and 10 single women live in a house together to find their perfect match. 
PHOTOS: Divorce Off? ‘Teen Mom’s Kailyn Lowry & Javi Marroquin Filming ‘Marriage Boot Camp’ 
He added, “I have a 3-year-old little boy, he means everything to me. I’m trying to figure out who is the one. I’m trying to take someone out on a date.” 
But Marroquin explained to Radar how he “doubts” he would be able to join the show because it conflicts with filming for Teen Mom 2 . 
Lowry announced her divorce from Marroquin in May 2016 after months of split rumors. 
Marroquin briefly dated Nancy Gisell and Cassie Bucka since his return from deployment . 
The reality dating show appearance would be the ultimate revenge on Lowry, who admitted to sleeping with another man while he was on deployment. 
Lowry is currently expecting a child with her third baby daddy, whose identity has yet to be revealed . 
Do you think Marroquin should join Million Dollar Matchmaker? Tell us in the comments!
